CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, March 29, 1969, pg. 15 reads: "Appreciation Gesture - Mrs. Marion Davis, second from right, clerk of New Grace Baptist Church, received a gift of appreciation for her dedicated services, at an affair given in her honor recently, which marked both her birthday and her wedding anniversary. The Rev. L.C.Carter, left, made the presentation on behalf of the membership.  James Davis, husband of the honoree, and Mrs. Emma Lindsay, her aunt, share the delight of the occasion. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Rev. L.C.Carter, presenting gift of appreciation to Marion Davis, with husband James Davis, and aunt Mrs. Emma Lindsay looking on, posed in New Grace Baptist Church
